title: Pumpkin Growing Basics | From the Ground Up

subtasks: Considering the local climate and growing season
Starting pumpkin seeds indoors to start growth early
Transplanting pumpkin seedlings outdoors when the growing season is longer
Allocating space for pumpkin growth (e.g., spacing plants appropriately)
Harvesting pumpkins for use as jack-o-lanterns or edibles
Teaching children about the growth cycle of pumpkins
Using pumpkins as a fun and engaging way to encourage interest in gardening
Contacting local Extension offices for more information
Notifying viewers of the source (University of Wyoming Extension) and the presenter (Hannah Johnson)
